## utils.isBytesKeyPair() function

Type guard function to check if the given key is a raw key pair of Uint8Array typed arrays.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isBytesKeyPair(key: BytesKeyPair | undefined): key is BytesKeyPair;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | [BytesKeyPair](./crypto.byteskeypair.md) \| undefined | The key to check. |

**Returns:**

key is [BytesKeyPair](./crypto.byteskeypair.md)

True if the key is a pair of Uint8Array typed arrays, false otherwise.
